description: Kill N mobs in a row
advice[]: Hydron on Sedna or Helene on Saturne + Loki and weapons like Ignis or Amprex

description: Kill N dargyn pilots before they hit the ground
advice[]: Arca Plasmor and/or Nova to slow pilot's fall;Mag with Magnetize and shoot the border of the bubble.
Volt ability 1 (or Arca Plasmor with range) just after take-off. Else sniper rifle on flying condrocs at the west of the map.
